Regarding whether a formal [APPLY] next round would be worthwhile: unless there has been a clear shift in availability among those higher-priority candidates, an immediate application is unlikely to change the outcome. Continuing periodic check-ins (every 2–3 rounds) is sufficient, and we encourage you to keep pursuing other options in parallel.

If circumstances change and we are able to make the seat offerable to you, we will respond promptly.

Sincerely,
School_C Admissions

Sincerely,
